title: Nivea Natural Balance Day Care, 50ml
description: NIVEA Natural Balance Moisturizing Day Care for Normal Skin is made from 99% ingredients of natural origin.
sitename: Nivea Natural Balance Day Care, 50ml - German Drugstore
cleaned_text: Day Care for Normal Skin is made from 99% ingredients of natural origin and offers 100% transparency for you and your skin. The day care moisturizes 24h, is absorbed particularly quickly and leaves a feeling of freshness - for naturally beautiful, healthy-looking skin. The skin compatibility of the day care is dermatologically confirmed. Ingredients from nature that retain more than 50% of their molecular structure (natural state) after processing, including water. Refreshing formula with organic aloe vera 100% soothing formula with precious jojoba and almond oils Moisturizes the skin for 24 hours Leaves the skin feeling fresh
